comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Not ice skating: ice DANCING! Anyone trying to Google their names will be disappointed, so these are not celebrities; probably just happy participants in an ice carnival, such as the big one at Red Bank, New Jersey -- an attraction, held annually, that drew participants from New York as well. New York Times story, February 22, 1914: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?_r=1&res=9E07E...
